channel.title: Blogpaper example site on Blogpaper
channel.description: Recent content in Blogpaper example site on Blogpaper

item.title: Style Guide - Also a good read.
item.description: The Style Guide provides you with a set of standards for the writing and design of theme posts and pages, either for general use or for a specific publication, organization, or field.

item.title: Zack is Awesome
item.description:
Zack to Ella: I’ll leave this here for you to read over. It details formatting for bolding and headers and such.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: read this for instruction on how to link videos and images and such.
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
